decision_conditions: The proposed amendment to introduce a side elevation bay window in terms of design, street scene and character, is considered to cause harm to the character and appearance of the host building and the surrounding area, and is not consistent with the Protocol for Non-Material Amendments as it would compromise the design and appearance of the extensions.
description: Application for a Non Material Amendment (S.96a), bay window on the ground floor and internal layout changes on the first floor in relation to planning permission 230906HH dated 27.04.2023 for 'Two storey rear extension (following demolition of outrigger and single storey rear addition); conversion of existing loft into habitable space incorporating window and rooflight to main rear roofslope); and installation of insertion of new double door, first floor (obscure glazed) and ground floor windows to flank elevation of main house (replacing existing windows)'
